text: 4.6: Stt 1.3; Ais 9.2; 2 Ko 3.18; 1 Pi 2.9; 2 Pi 1.19Fhe Bakɨme fhum guarara suaŋgi, ana khaŋ nzuai, “Gɨngɨnan vhen vhavar ŋaar shɨrarga.” Mba Fhe Bakɨmen vhava ŋaarara, ana nza ndavi vherir kav, guigira khaŋ tɨgap nta shɨrigi. Ana maaŋ mbuav, nza guigira Zisas Krais khomara garav, nza vhɨra vhava ŋaara guara garav, nza kaŋgi, ana Fhe Bakɨmen vhava ŋaara bakɨme ma.
